name: Deep Mother's tentacles rising
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Atmospheric scene: Deep Mother's tentacles rising, clear narrative focal point, atmospheric VFX support, cinematic light shaping, high-fidelity illustration, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Atmospheric illustration of: Deep Mother's tentacles rising.
revised_prompt: Imagine a high-fidelity, cinematic and atmospheric scene from a fantastical and medieval-themed tabletop game universe. In the heart of the ocean's depth, Deep Mother's majestic tentacles rise, creating a clear narrative focal point. The palpable underwater environment is filled with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents adding to the atmosphere's depth. The style is akin to a painterly collection, with influences from atmospheric fantasy realism. The palate is awash in shades of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, with highlights of iridescent pearl. All characters, if present, are decked in culturally coherent, medieval gear void of any modern technological aspects. There is a notable absence of readable signage or paragraphs and rather the use of meaningful symbols or numbered pins. No elements of modern signage or sci-fi UIs, nor attributes of photorealism, and anime styles are included. The image follows a certain resolution and aspect ratio and avoids any visual artifacts.
